titleStmt.title: An Exact list of all the men, women, and boys that died on board the Indian and African company's fleet during their voyage from Scotland to America and since their landing in Caldeonia together with a particular account of their qualities, the several days of their deaths, and the respective distempers or accidents of which they died.

An Exact list of all the men, women, and boys that died on board the Indian and African company's fleet during their voyage from Scotland to America and since their landing in Caldeonia together with a particular account of their qualities, the several days of their deaths, and the respective distempers or accidents of which they died.
titleStmt.author: Mackenzie, Roderick, Esq.

notesStmt.note: "This is a true list ... by me Rod. Mackenzie ..."
Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.

orgName.name: Company of Scotland Trading to Africa and the Indies
